title: Italy : natural gas imports 2018 , by country of origin
yAxis: Natural gas imports in million cubic meters
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Natural gas imports in million cubic meters in the y axis.
Country Russia has the highest Natural gas imports in million cubic meters and Holland has the lowest Natural gas imports in million cubic meters.
The highest Country Russia has 31318.0 more Natural gas imports in million cubic meters than the lowest Country Holland.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Natural gas imports in million cubic meters for 7 number of Countrys.
Country Russia has the highest Natural gas imports in million cubic meters and Holland has the lowest Natural gas imports in million cubic meters.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Natural gas imports in million cubic meters in the y axis.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Natural gas imports in million cubic meters for 7 number of Countrys.
The maximum Natural gas imports in million cubic meters 32321.0 is found at Country Russia and the minimum is found at Holland where Country is 1003.0.
Country Algeria has the second highest value for Natural gas imports in million cubic meters.
There is a difference of 31318.0 between the maximum Country Russia and minimum Country Holland.
Country Russia is higher than any other Countrys with value 32321.0, followed by Algeria, and Qatar. Down to Country Holland with the lowest value 1003.0.
The Country Russia tends to be 3.33 percent higher than average.
Summing up the values of all Countrys, we get total 67873.0.
